description: Try our easy to follow Nectarine Brûlée recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nectarine Brûlée Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4.5 tbs orange liqueur (save 1/2tbs to flavour the fruit)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the nectarines in a saucepan and add enough water to cover. Poach over a low heat for 5-10 minutes, or until tender. Drain and divide between 6 individual ramekins. Stir in a little orange liqueur.

Beat together the soured cream, nutmeg, vanilla extract and the 4 tablespoons orange liqueur in a bowl until well combined. Spoon over the nectarine slices, then scatter the sugar over the top in a thick layer.
Cook under a preheated high grill until the sugar caramelizes. Serve with brandy snaps, langues du chat or amaretti.
